name: pageviews
description: This table contains all pageviews of Bindle's website.

columns.name: visitor_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of a visitor. A fingerprint used to keep track of guest visitors who haven’t had signed up.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: If user is logged in – ID of a user in users table.

columns.name: referer_url
columns.description: URL of the previous page where user clicked on a link with URL.

columns.name: screen_resolution
columns.description: Screen resolution of a user’s device. Example: 1024x1366.

columns.name: device_type
columns.description: Type of a user’s device. Could be mobile, tablet or desktop.

columns.name: custom_parameters
columns.description: All custom parameters of a pageview in a key-value format. Could be added per page, for example we might add ab_test_variation key to keep track of what AB-test variation user had seen.

columns.name: country
columns.description: Country derived from user’s IP address.
